::KitKat:;

A knocking at the door woke her up.  She opened her eyes, but they 
wouldn't open all the way.  Her head felt like a ship was blasting 
it.  The knocking sounded like thunder in her ears.  She spoke 
softly,"yeah,yeah,I'm coming."  She slowly got up and went to the 
door.  She opened the door and saw Drillbit standing there. She said 
on a gruff whisper,"hello there." She had her hand on her head. She 
had dark circles around her eyes and her tail was just hanging down 
and not swaying around like normal.  "Come on in." She left the door 
open for him.  She slowly sat in her chair. "Just please keep our 
voice down untill the ship stops firing it's cannons inside my head."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> Ridumus continued to work on the Ark.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit woke up, and walked to KitKat's door. He knocked on the 
door.
> "Hey KitKat, we should get started." He says.
